title: Aussies win third T20I to seal series
content: Australia won the third T20I against Sri Lanka in Canberra today (15) to seal the series 3-0 with two matches remaining.Sri Lanka managed 121 for six after being sent into bat first, with skipper Dasun Shanaka making an unbeaten 39 off 38 deliveries.Dinesh Chandimal made 25.In bowling for the hosts, Kane Richardson claimed three for 21.Australia reached 124 for four in 17 overs, as Aaron Finch and Glenn Maxwell made 35 off 36 deliveries and a 26-ball 39 respectively.In bowling for Sri Lanka, Maheesh Theekshana claimed three for 24.
